echo_code.summary: Biosonar-inspired active sensing for assistive mobility and robotics. Emit designed clicks/chirps; matched-filter echoes; build local maps.

black_hole_analogs_set.summary: Universality table of 'black-hole-like' sinks across scales: CPA optics, acoustic/BEC horizons, ring cavities, metamaterial absorbers, lysosome/proteasome, fungal hubs.
deliverables: Two plots: critical coupling spectrum; on-resonance reflectivity curve

compression_emission_ladder.summary: Guide mapping compression inputs (gas, plasma, solid) to dominant emission relief channels (photons, phonons, particles, flows) and design implications for Eden/Harmony.

phase_flip_cosmogenesis.summary: Speculative origin story: parallel weakly coupled 'sheets' with a phase flip forming domain walls that radiate, nucleate rings/bubbles, and stabilize as solitonic structures.
notes: Kept narrative-only; not used for siting or policy

acoustic_nodes_demo_v0_1.protocol: 40 kHz phased-array or transducer + curved reflector to create standing nodes; levitate 1–3 mm polystyrene beads; shift phase to show node collapse.
acoustic_nodes_demo_v0_1.success: Demonstrate counter-gravity trapping and controlled release; produce short video + methods

glossary.Sky Lattice: Atmospheric micro‑nowcasting layer using infrasound/pressure cues + open radar fusion.
glossary.Echo Code: Biosonar-inspired active sensing module (assistive and robotics).
glossary.Black\u2011Hole Analogs Set: Table and demos of perfect-absorber/horizon analogs across physics and biology.
glossary.Compression\u2192Emission Ladder: Design guide mapping compression to preferred emission channels.

ai_review_prompts: Assess Echo Code v0.1: are matched-filter and small-array methods sufficient for safe assistive use? Propose benchmarks and a bias/safety review.
Black-Hole Analogs: verify the analogy table for accuracy; suggest two reproducible tabletop demos.

scope_first_principles.mission: Coordinate contribution, stewardship, and planetary safety through proof, repair, and resonance‑aligned design.
scope_first_principles.separation_of_powers: Astris (merit) ≠ Auctor (voice); validation independent from funding and governance.

canonical_definitions.Thread: Bounded project with charter, budget, metrics, and end/renewal date.
canonical_definitions.Validator: Peer elected to verify proofs; rotated and audited.
canonical_definitions.Steward: Operational lead for a thread; accountable for safety/ethics.
canonical_definitions.Civic Tome: Versioned corpus of protocols, precedents, and rulings.

evidence_levels.E3: Replicated pilots in 2+ sites; open data + methods
evidence_levels.policy_rule: Policy uses E3+ only; Eden/Harmony aim for E3; Gaia/Sky advisory until E4.

fields: People (steward, validators, data custodian, safety officer)

validation_pipeline.audits: ≥10% randomized audits; Astris paused on failures until corrected.

Astris.minting: Upon G3 or partial at G2 with escrow; amounts per thread impact table
Astris.decay: Default half‑life (e.g., 18 months); Legacy Astris (capped, no decay) for public goods
Astris.use: Curation rights, queue priority, service access; not voting power

Auctor.distribution: Equal per verified person per epoch
Auctor.reset: Balances zero each epoch; no trading/carryover

principles: Open methods + anonymized CSVs for E2+

safety_ethics.irb_lite: Human subjects checklist; exclude medical claims.
safety_ethics.halting: Pre‑defined stop conditions (adverse events, sensor faults, threshold breaches).

Eden.pass: ≥15% kWh cut and comfort↑ over 30–90 days

governance_cycles_amendments.amendment_path: Proposal → Auctor vote → validator concurrence → Tome diff

funding_conflicts.firewall: Validators not paid by audited thread

change_management.deprecations: 1‑epoch notice; migration notes; archived with reason

red_lines: No surveillance or personal geotracking without explicit, revocable consent
